shortDescription: Subversion ALM for the enterprise before 8.8.2 allows reflected XSS at multiple locations.
vulnerabilityName: Atlassian subversion_application_lifecycle_management Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
